sentence.Network_en: These drugs work by reversibly blocking nerve conduction.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些药物履历可逆性的阻断神经传导起作用.

sentence.Network_en: Oxygen carrier is a kind of transition metal complexes which can absorb O 2 reversibly.
sentence.Network_cn: 氧载体是一类能够可逆吸收分子氧的过渡金属配合物.

sentence.Network_en: ConclusionRadix Aconiti Kusnezoffii can block the conduction of action potential of nerve reversibly.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论草乌能可逆地阻滞神经动作电位的传导.

PerfectNetExp.abs: To mutate or change morphologically , often reversibly ., 突变 , 变异经受突变或形态上的改变 , 常为可逆地.
